properties.name: Paul's Coffee Roasters
properties.description: Cozy coffee shop in Larnaca downtown. There are 5-7 wellknown coffee origins, V60, Cold Brew and classic drinks. A small main hall and a large garden in the backyard. Few power outlets for digital nomads

properties.name: Uluwatu Specialty Coffee
properties.description: Large selection of coffee origins and comfortable sofas in the old town of Limassol. Few outlets only

properties.name: South Coast Specialty Coffee
properties.description: Large coffee shop in the Mackenzie beach area. Several classic coffee origins, tables with sockets and a separate playground for children

properties.name: Menta Speciality CoffeeShop
properties.description: Very small coffee shop with a few tables outside. Greek barista and the perfect V60 and Cold Brew

properties.name: Kollaborative Coffee Roasters
properties.description: Middle-size coffee shop and bar in Nicosia old town. Selection of coffee origins, few tables inside and outside

properties.name: Nomad Bread & Coffee
properties.description: Small takeaway coffee shop in Limassol center with lots of coffee origins. No power sockets at all
